resources.string: Provide quantitative or qualitative soil test values for specific nutrient. For quantitative values, provide the value in specific nutrient field. If you don\'t know the quantitative value check the quality you know for the specific nutrient.

Crop season: Boro Rice
Variety: BRRI hybrit dhan3
Yield goal: 7.5+/-0.75
Texture: Loamy
Type: Upland crop

Fertilizer Recommendation Calculator provides guidelines for achieving high yield goal based fertilizer recommendation for different crops. If soil test values of a field are available, specific fertilizer dose for that particular field can be calculated using this app.
